column1: # This sequence is designed to deplete one chain's stock (25 shares)
# 1. Human player (Player 0) founds a chain on turn 1
# 2. Human buys 3 stocks of that chain each turn
# The chain tiles should be close together so human can keep
# expanding/buying without triggering mergers with other chains.
# Tower chain tiles concentrated in columns 1-4
# Other players get tiles in different areas (columns 8-12)
# Additional mid-game tiles - mostly Tower region for growth
# Player 2's hand - tiles far from Tower region
# Player 1's hand - tiles far from Tower region
# Player 0's hand - Tower region tiles (LAST = FIRST dealt)
# 1A and 2A adjacent -> found Tower chain turn 1
